nodes.text: The YT Dart was a model of small spacetug designed by an authorized affiliate of the Corellian Engineering Corporation to serve as an auxiliary craft for YT-1300 light freighters. A compact ship with a narrow viewport, the YT Dart fit between the front mandibles of the YT-1300, seemingly extending its prow and giving it a sleeker appearance. When Lando Calrissian owned the Millennium Falcon, he had an YT Dart modified into a maneuvrable two-passenger life pod by sealing its viewport and installing both a hyperdrive and a more powerful sublight engine.
